sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_c8dd89251b550110af618623604bcbd2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GetCallerLocation</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetCallerLocation</name><script><![CDATA[var GetCallerLocation = Class.create();
GetCallerLocation.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    GetCallerLocationDetails: function() {
        //gs.addInfoMessage('script include triggered');

        var callerId = this.getParameter('callerId');
        //gs.addInfoMessage('Caller sysID--' + callerId);
        obj = {};
        //comment added to prevent empty block statement alert.

        try {

            var grcallerLocation = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
            grcallerLocation.get(callerId);

            //gs.addInfoMessage(grcallerLocation.get(caller_Id));
            obj.name = grcallerLocation.getValue('name');

            //Pass the sys_id of the assignment_group reference field
            obj.location = grcallerLocation.getValue('location');
            //gs.addInfoMessage(obj + JSON.stringify(obj));

            return JSON.stringify(obj);
            //comment added to prevent empty block statement alert.

        } catch (err) {
            gs.addErrorMessage("A runtime error occurred:" + err);
        }

    },

    type: 'GetCallerLocation'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-26 20:32:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>c8dd89251b550110af618623604bcbd2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetCallerLocation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c8dd89251b550110af618623604bcbd2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-26 21:27:19</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
